messages.title: A personal message for
messages.content: As a local resident, I know what a fantastic place Bolton West is to live, work and raise a family. I've campaigned hard on the issues you've told me matter â€“ securing jobs, investing in local infrastructure and tackling crime and anti-social behaviour. As your MP, I'll find solutions to the problems we face and build on the progress we've made. With crime rates down, unemployment down and national debt reduction across our area, this election is your chance to elect a strong local champion to build on these achievements.

mentions.otherPartyLeaderCandidate: David Cameron, Ed Miliband, Nick Clegg, Nigel Farage, Nicola Sturgeon, Alex Salmond, Vince Cable

issues.economy: The deficit down, Income tax cut, More jobs, New businesses
